articles.description: Everton cancel plans to demolish Goodison Park and will make the stadium home to their women's team.
articles.title: Goodison Park: Everton's women's team to use stadium as new home as demolition cancelled

articles.description: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti says he has "never had a problem" with the club and does not want to "make a big deal" out of his impending departure for the Brazil national team.
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti 'never had a problem' with Real Madrid

articles.description: Nottingham Forest Forest deny there was a confrontation between owner Evangelos Marinakis and manager Nuno Espirito Santo after Sunday's Premier League draw with Leicester.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest deny confrontation between owner Evangelos Marinakis and Nuno Espirito Santo calling the reaction to it 'fake news'

articles.description: Why did some Liverpool fans boo Trent Alexander-Arnold when he came on against Arsenal on Sunday? BBC Sport canvasses opinion.
articles.title: Why did Liverpool fans boo Trent Alexander-Arnold vs Arsenal?

articles.description: A look back at 75 years of F1 history with Getty images.
articles.title: F1 at 75

articles.description: Olympic 800m champion Keely Hodgkinson said her first race since winning gold in Paris last summer will be a "nerve-wracking one".
articles.title: Keely Hodgkinson prepared for 'nerve-wracking' return in Diamond League

articles.description: Five players involved in the Indian Premier League have been named in England's squad for the ODI series against West Indies later this month.
articles.title: England players at IPL: Harry Brook's side call up five players for Windies series

articles.description: The Pakistan Super League (PSL) will resume on Saturday 17 May.
articles.title: PSL 2025: Tournament to resume on Saturday 17 May after postponement

articles.description: Tour de France winner and five-time Olympic champion Sir Bradley Wiggins says he became a cocaine addict in the years after his career.
articles.title: Bradley Wiggins: Tour de France winner says he was cocaine addict

articles.description: The Minnesota Vikings will become the first NFL team to play in three countries in one season during 2025.
articles.title: NFL International Games 2025: Minnesota Vikings to play in Dublin and London in 2025
